Theft in shops

in Arani

Unidentified persons broke the locks of three shops in Vinnamangalam village near Arani and attempted to break another shop in the same village on Friday.

The thieves broke into a fertilizer shop, cement shop and cool drinks shop in the village and are said to have stolen a total of about Rs.25,000 from the cash boxes there.

The thieves have also attempted to break open another fertilizer shop in the same village. – Staff Reporter
title: Theft in shops near Arani
